tag_professor: LECTURE HEAVY (1)  SO MANY PAPERS (1)  Get ready to read (1)  Respected (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)
stu_tags: SO MANY PAPERS  SKIP CLASS? YOU WON\'T PASS.  GET READY TO READ
comments: Professor Kruglinski is a very nice lady but she is not easy going when it comes to papers and tests. Her museum papers and other ones are not easy at all. If you like art and you want to learn about it, take her, but if you take this class only to have another humanity class passed, don\'t take her because it os a lot of work!

tag_professor: LECTURE HEAVY (1)  SO MANY PAPERS (1)  Get ready to read (1)  Respected (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)
comments: She\'s very passionate about Art History. She\'s calm & quirky and class goes smoothly. We have two quizzes plus one midterm and the final. Overall I hate the subject no fault of hers this is my 2nd bout. She does make it a bit more interesting than my previous professor. She is really great in the communication department as well so that\'s a plus.

tag_professor: LECTURE HEAVY (1)  SO MANY PAPERS (1)  Get ready to read (1)  Respected (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)
comments: Quite possibly one of the best teachers for art history in the history of American universities. She breaks down course materials so they are easy to follow and digest, and she is extremely helpful during office hours, always making a point to be there for her students when they need. Her lectures are entertaining and informative.

tag_professor: LECTURE HEAVY (1)  SO MANY PAPERS (1)  Get ready to read (1)  Respected (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)
comments: Great teacher who makes her 101 possibly the least stressful on campus. Everything\'s right out of the lecture and if you write down something you remembered next to a multiple choice question you think you got wrong she\'ll give you partial credit (!!!).

tag_professor: LECTURE HEAVY (1)  SO MANY PAPERS (1)  Get ready to read (1)  Respected (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)
comments: Reading responses due twice a week. Keeps changing the syllabus which can get annoying. Over 150 artworks on the Midterm. One test and one final 10 page paper.

tag_professor: LECTURE HEAVY (1)  SO MANY PAPERS (1)  Get ready to read (1)  Respected (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)
comments: LOVED this teacher. If I could have every arh class with her I would. She inspired me to make this subject my minor. Really loves what she does and it comes through in her class. I really can\'t say enough good things about her. SHE\'S AMAZING!

tag_professor: LECTURE HEAVY (1)  SO MANY PAPERS (1)  Get ready to read (1)  Respected (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)
comments: She was a very cool professor. Don\'t get the textbook. Just attend the class and take notes and you\'ll pass the class with an A.

tag_professor: LECTURE HEAVY (1)  SO MANY PAPERS (1)  Get ready to read (1)  Respected (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)
comments: Really didn\'t want to take this class but I actually really like her. She\'s into what she teaches and is a very easy grader. 2 tests and a non-cumulative final. Attendance is mandatory but class isn\'t bad.

tag_professor: LECTURE HEAVY (1)  SO MANY PAPERS (1)  Get ready to read (1)  Respected (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)
comments: Reallt nice and easy to get along with.
